channel.title: One of my first blender scenes, table for two. updated!
channel.description: i know its not the best but im also not good at modeling, i know the fire is messed up but i just wanted to post to get your guys criticism. and this was made in blender. 1st render: [img]http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac248/jakesisky/dinnerfortwo.jpg[/img] 2nd render: changes: rematerialized objects changed color scheme changed out candle for rose [img]http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac248/jakesisky/tablefortwo.jpg[/img]

item.title: One of my first blender scenes, table for two. updated!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Hmm… well
The utensils don’t look sharp. Tbh I have no idea what the people are going to eat, but the utensils aren’t sharp.
Also, the drinking goblet thing appears to be solid. I don’t believe people still drink out of silver chalices.
The shadows are to dramatic. Even with the most intense light on something, there will still be a small gradiation between the light and the dark.

Read full topic
